Articles.Content:
hi !

This is the Battle Cruiser from SC ! The origanal craft is more than 1400 parts so i build a Welded version .

Now it's only 50 parts . Tweaked for around 50 tons .

You can put 2 Kerbals into two command seats but as long as nobody are inside , use "control from here " from the front docking port !

Was very long to build , i try to have a closer looking of the Battle Cruiser With only one mod ( BahamutoDs Armory / 2 turrels & 1 rocket pods )

.craft :https://onedrive.live.com/redir?resid=B4FEC25180514B47!1205&authkey=!AIsQParhwO5DV3A&ithint=file%2ccraft

Ubio Part :https://onedrive.live.com/redir?resid=B4FEC25180514B47!1206&authkey=!AMqtFR9tWa5Ov_w&ithint=file%2crar

Edited October 28, 2014 by ZLM-Master
